caption: Jean-Marc, the chief trouble maker, erm I mean the chief truffle maker is a wonderfully passionate chef who never disappoints you.  He uses his French family recipes to conjure 26 or is it 30 types of artisinal truffles with booze (think …
Super good food
Best coffee and truffle spot in town. Try bitter hot chocolate and caramel latte.
Wow absolutely incredible. This guy is the real deal. Homemade truffles from France on Columbus Ave. San Francisco. Very warm and welcoming. Don't miss this!
This truffles are very yummy, every bite is yummy!!! Highly recommended!
If you are around try this place. The most fresh truffles you can find.

Be aware: In the past 2 weeks I went there 3 times during the times they were supposed to be open per Google, and they were not. I'm giving 5 stars based on my previous experience but I'm really hoping the owner will take 2 minutes of their time to update the hours.

What a gem! This place is a must when visiting San Francisco. The owner is pleasant, the truffles are amazing! This is a guy who loves what he does and you can taste it in every bite! The price is more than reasonable for the quality and service you are getting! Our favorites were the cognac and Sebastian champagne.
Literally the best hot chocolate I’ve ever had, tastes how my grandpa used to make it.
Tried and true favorite of San Francisco. Get a free truffle with every coffee! Also makes for a lovely gift for those friends/relatives missing the Bay Area.
I went for multiple flavors - some of them like the coconut truffle was gone, so prefer to go early. Everything is amazing, not overly sweet, and better yet, with a coffee you get one truffle free.
The best truffles in Town
delicious chocolate... and I don't like chocolate
Good cappuccino, so many truffle choices.
I stop by whenever I am in the neighborhood - the coffee truffles are amazing.
Best handmade truffles in SF.  Noisette and peanut butter are my favorites.

One of my favorite places in North Beach (lived there for most of my life). Great, affordable authentic French style chocolate truffles, plus good coffee & excellent hot chocolate. If you love chocolate, put this on your SF bucket list. …
Give Jean Marc  your business. His truffles are fabulous
This place is the real deal!
This place is a dream come true! By far one of the best for buying candy from bulk bins in terms of taste and variety.

(Translated by Google) The chocolate is delicious ~ The owner is very kind, buying one taste will let you try another taste, and you will keep buying it if you are not careful ~  (Original) 巧克力好吃～老闆很親切，買了一種口味會讓你試吃另外一種口味，一不小心就不停買下去～
Handmade truffles that you will love, also the staff is very kind

My Favorite Chocolate place in the world, it's a great hole in the wall. They make some of the best espresso and coffee and everytime I get a LB of chocolate with the coffee and it is perfect, I will be flying down to see if they are open today pick some up
Outstanding hot chocolate, great tea, phenomenal truffle but what truly makes this establishment amazing is the Owner!!
Really affordable truffles! A free truffle with the purchase of a coffee is probably their best idea as this is what started my truffle craze.
Delicious hot chocolate!

Truffles. Truffles. And more truffles. You get whole lotta truffles in a whole lotta flavor! They are more rustic looking on the outside, but on the inside they are so delectable, tasty, chocolaty and melts right in the mouth. They have an …
The place is small but the truffles are the best I've had 😍. Do check this shop out.
This owner is just an awesome guy who hand makes all the truffles here.  They are small but delicious.
Amazing truffles from such an awesome guy. This is a must try! Everything is hand made just like in France
Delicious! Great mocha and life changing truffles!

Wonderful hot chocolate ! If you are looking for a nice little spot to stop while visiting SF and have a real hot chocolate, this is definitely the place to go. In addition, the french owner Jean-Marc, is really friendly and he will enlight …
Very good taste
Great coffee and you get a free truffle! Try the amaretto truffle, its delicious!
their truffles are amazing!
Best truffles I've ever had !!!
A secret gem. The best handmade chocolate truffles. The stuff of dreams. Impeccable.
We never miss XOX coffee, being in San Francisco. Our favorite coffee place. Love it!
Nice owner, nice coffee, nice truffles

Stopped in on my way through Chinatown for a cup of tea. Jean Marc, the owner here, is dealing out chocolates on another level. The chocolates here are next-level deliciousness. If you have never had a traditional French truffle, I highly …

They have candy from my era!!! I am so hyped about this place!! Decorations are so cute and amazing and my kids love it too!! Good prices and amazing malts too!! Please come to this place if you want good candy!!
Small place with amazing truffles!

Great espresso, smooth and not at all bitter or sour. Coffee comes with a free truffle, which you get to pick from a wide variety. I got cognac and my wife got amaretto; they were both delicious. Will definitely return.
Best coffee in San Francisco
Great coffee, truffles and people!!!
The coffee here is amazing! They had non dairy options for creamer and vegan orange flavored truffles. When you buy a cup you get a free treat! Plus we loved them so much we bought more to share!

Had the wonderful pleasure to meet the owner of XOX, John Mark.  An interesting business owner that makes a beautiful truffle. Watching the master at his craft is a pleasure and tasting the results is fantastic!  Truly enjoyable.

I was getting lunch nearby and came here at the suggestion of a friend. This place is amazing! We got to try almost all the different kinds of truffles with just a small box.  Literally the best truffles I've ever had, and the gentleman behind the counter was SO helpful. Go here.
If an actual wizard used alchemy to make truffles, they still wouldn't be as good as XOX truffles.  Go here. Best truffles you'll ever have.
Nice store to get fudge
Exceptional
Very friendly shopkeeper, amazing truffles and coffee

Discovered this little gem during a walk - got a sample truffle with my coffee and ended up ordering two boxes of truffles to take back home - great chocolate and flavors, pleasant staff, great packaging and pricing
One of the best hot chocolate i ever had in my life!
De-lish! Can't go wrong with any of their authentic, dark chocolate flavors. Nuff said.
Amazing truffles! Great customer service!
Best truffles in the city
I want to give this place 10 starts if I would, my favorite store in the universe!!!! Excellent service excellent chocolate  all kinds!!!!

The high rating is for the complete experience and one of the best truffles that I've ever had.  The coffee is good in the way that coffee used to be good before hipster places took over the coffee scene. It is strong and just bitter enough …
Tiny place but great chocolate, not too fancy
A lovely little chocalatier and coffee shop with truffles to die for. Try the cognac and a mocha! The owner is very knowledgeable and happy to chat about the best kind.

Stumble upon this shop and bought a box of 20 truffles (more than 10 flavours to choose from!!!) after reading the reviews. They were really good!!! Owner was really nice and gave us 2 additional truffles to try.
(Translated by Google) Succulent chocolates ... a comforting coffee ... so what more?  (Original) Des chocolats succulents... un café réconfortant... alors que demander de plus?
Good truffles
Randomly walked past and grabbed a coffee. The smell of the truffles was amazing and the taste was even more so!! Homemade right in the shop, the gentleman was lovely and we loved this place
Awesome coffee with free handmade truffle! Take that, fartbucks!
Handmade chocolate truffles! Found by accident when we parked in front of the door! If you like chocolate, don't miss this! Another San Francisco jewel!
(Translated by Google) Very good italian Espresso and wonderful sweets. Italians come here 😁  (Original) Very good italian Espresso and wonderful sweets. Italiani venite qui 😁
This is by far the best chocolate/coffee place I have ever been to. The service is god tier and the man there is the GOAT. I love this place and highly recommend it.
Amazing hot chocolate
Best truffles I've ever had!
Best truffles I've ever had.
Delicious! I can't wait to try more truffle flavors!
Delish
Delicious! If you're a chocoholic, beware! I say better Hot Chocolate than Ghirardelli, and a free truffle with drink purchase!

(Translated by Google) We came across this small cafe run by a very nice and friendly French guy, who also speaks good Italian! The specialty is chocolate truffles, in various special and delicious flavors, but ordering a coffee (good !!!) …
Great coffee and truffle combo
Sweet! One of the best things about North Beach...they sell the most wonderful tiny truffles in the most delicious flavors. Smart marketing the white "Chinese Food" container...
Amazing!!
Great truffles, and excellent hot chocolate in different varieties.

Came upon this little shop my first time in San Francisco in 2007. It's a little bit of France in the heart of Little Italy. On returning to San Francisco in August of 2018, I made the trek over Knob Hill just for another box of their …
Can't get enough
Suuuuper delicious truffles! Gotta stop for a quick sweet treat and coffee.
Do yourself a favor and stop here. Coffee, truffles, and chocolates absolutely out of this world good - GREAT.

Luckily I've been here on other visits to SF, but on this last visit XOXO was randomly closed at 3pm on a weekday.  Soooo disappointed as I'd talked up the amazingness to my friend and it was our last day in town.  She was so looking forward to buying some truffles to take home to Utah!
The owner, Jean Marc, is very pleasant. His coffee is great, reasonably priced and comes with a truffle. Also his truffles are rich and delicious.
Really nice service and awesome truffles! I would love to go back for coffee and to chitchat with one of the servers. His beauty amazed me 💕
Best truffles and service in the city. The owner is the nicest person in the world.  Try the hot chocolate. It blows Ghiradelli's out of the park.

This place has the best, most artisan truffles I’ve ever had! It’s my second time here. You get free truffles with coffee- 1 per coffee. You can sit outside and watch the people go by. The man was rolling truffles himself when we arrived. Try the orange flavor and hazelnut truffles... u won’t be disappointed!
A gem in SF!
Little place with nice people and really good truffles!
Simply the most delicious truffles in San Francisco not to mention the coffee also
Nothing beats a free truffle with a mocha

Best chocolate truffles I've found anywhere. That's including searches in Paris, New York, Los Angeles, Tokyo, Hong Kong, London, and Berlin. I stop here every time I'm in SF to get some for the family.
Free truffle with any coffee! And they're amazing
If you are looking for hand made truffles with interesting flavors this is the place to go.  They also do a pretty good mocha.

UPDATE - Stopped back in on way to airport. Arrived at 10:33 and waited till 10;37. There was back man inside but he wouldn't  open door. Customer service is just as important as quality of product.  Original - Pleas update on Google maps. …

Excellent bite-sized traditional style truffles. This is the original storefront (opened in 1998) and they now have a space at SFO, as well. Difficult to stop eating them once you start popping them in your mouth. Free truffle with purchase.
Great coffee and truffles. The barista really takes pride in what he serves.
The best chocolate and espresso coffee ever!
Want the best truffles you never tried, it's a must, they're addictive, trust me they are.

Walked in, got a coffee. He gives you one free truffle with your coffee... It was so good I had to go right back in and buy 20 more. Great coffee, best truffles ever! Go for the truffles, and get a coffee while you are at it.
Amazing, understand why it's rated so highly. Do try some of the unique truffles.
My favorite place for coffee.  Truffles are amazing
Great truffles
A bit pricey for a very small truffle but tasty.
Delicious, and good value for money.
Wow !!! These are not your normal truffles these are out of this world.
Stopped by for a shot of espresso and a truffle for my lady. Delicious!
The best in SF!

(Translated by Google) Address must be made when you come to San Francisco! If you are going to San Francisco, You must go through this place!  (Original) Adresse à faire obligatoirement lors de votre venue sur San Francisco ! If you are going to San Francisco, You must go through this place !
Amazing hot chocolate and the truffles are always wonderful.try the milk chocolate hot chocolate if you like your HC sweet. And the best truffles - pomegranate, hazelnut, and peanut butter...
What can i say but delicious. Brought two boxes back home, savoured them for days. small little established perfect for a little rest and has that family run vibes and one extensive selection.
get a hot beverage and receive a complimentary truffle
Bought over 1000 truffles over 6 years. Best chocolates in America. They ship coast to coast too!
Great coffee, great chocolate, great truffles.  Will return soon.
The best truffles around. Period.
Excellent service!
Great truffles!!!
Our favorite truffle place in the bay area. Lots of flavors to select from at a great price.
Tiny little shop run by husband and wife. They have cute little gift boxes that make it a quick and easy present.  Coffees and a free sample are available as well.
Wow, I stopped here because I was too hungry to wait anywhere... This place is AWESOME!
The owner was very sweet and charming. The truffles and mocha coffee were delicious. All worth the 10 minute hunt for parking.
Talk to the owner, he's got some good stories about France & chocolate

Found these melt in your mouth truffles while on a Foodie Adventure in San Francisco.  I have never tried such delicious chocolate morsel in my life.  Have informed my husband that only these will do in the future :)
Great gifts.
Great products and nice owner:)
This tiny shop has the greatest truffles
Simply the best!
Amazing hot chocolate and truffles. Very well priced too
Yum
Stopped in for coffee,they gave me a free truffle oh wow, they make them fresh.
The most amazing truffles we have ever had!
Poor service.  Thanks k goodness the Truffles are good. I decided not to buy a second $30 box because of the service.
Great coffee and truffles. A truffle free with every coffee rocks too!

Top notch truffles, great hot chocolate and coffee as well as an awesome owner. Wondered in here off of the street because of their sign advertising a free truffle with any drink. Ended up sitting for 30 minutes talking to the owner and getting a second drink. Highly recommended!
Excellent chocolate truffles, coffee and got chocolate. One of San Francisco's finest that should not be missed!
Fast and Quick Service

Four Stars for Santos who still makes a delicious Café Mocha with "Real Chocolate" not the super sweet liquid squeezed out of a plastic bottle customary found at most coffee shops. AND Caramel Cayenne is a must.

I wouldn't have tried the truffles, but they give you a free one with coffee - and that's how you get hooked. Delicious, delicious, delicious. I ordered 20 for my friends! Great prices, great food, would highly recommend.
Buy a coffee get a truffle FREE. The truffles are delicious and there's lots of choice.  I'm told they make a mean cappuccino.
Great selection of tasty truffles.
(Translated by Google) I still remember the cognac truffles I have eaten here  (Original) 到現在還對這裡吃到的干邑松露巧克力念念不忘

Happily Stumbled upon this shop when walking the town. I wish I had left with more than 20. The chocolate was gone within 24 hours and checking their web page the online pricing was much higher. Still tempted to order some despite the cost!

This is definitely my "go-to" gift to hosts or friends or myself.  These truffles have been tasted and admired and enjoyed by everyone to whom I have offered them, enjoyed I am happy to say, by people around the world.  AND, it is a local …
All i can say i love there truffles. Place is really small but that gives it a cool atmosphere!

Incredible hand made, family owned, authentic French truffles in an incredible variety of chocolate heaven. Don't go late in the day, and expect everything to be available though. Oh yeah, kick ass coffee, and super nice staff as well!

It's not your typical truffle shop. The place isn't fancy, there aren't overpriced box sets of perfectly shaped truffles adorning the walls, nor anywhere else in the shop. What you'll find are really tasty hand rolled truffles in a bare …

These are hands down the best chocolates I've had in SF. The outside is a thin and delicate shell filled with intense, melt-in-your-mouth, smooth, and dense flavors. There is a wide variety to choose from, with my personal favorites being: …
Simply authentic, amazing, and delicious!!  My tastebuds were blown away. If you want a real truffle make sure you stop by here.
This place has awesome truffles. Another friend of mine went there and also ended up in this place. Good to buy back as souvenirs!
Wow!

I have been going to XOX for over 17 yrs. I love the variety of flavors, and the fact that they have no sugar or preservatives, therefore, you taste the real organic ingredients. They make perfect gifts for clients.
The truffles are amazing, and so many flavors!
The best!
Very good place to grab something to eat
Best truffles!
Hidden hole-in-the-wall in North Beach! Stop by for an amazing assortment of chocolate truffles. And if you ask nicely, they'll walk you through how they make each one!

They have got the best truffles in town hands down! I wouldn't know what flavors to suggest because I just love them all. They come in these cute little Chinese food take out boxes! Just give all of them a try and you will know why it's hard to pick a favorite!

From the moment you walk in, you can tell this place is special! Wow, the delicious smell of chocolate delights your senses.  Great coffee and free sample truffles made our visit spectacular! This is a place we will seek out and return to on our next visit to San Francisco!
Best truffles ever!
Great coffee and the truffles are a perfect compliment. Stop in after your bike tour with Dylan's!
Loved the truffles!! Hazelnut In particular. Also really liked the peanut butter, vanilla, and orange. The hot chocolate is fantastic!!!
Amazing handmade chocolate truffles
It doesn't get better than this place!

This tiny shop has a great selection of truffles, from the traditional to more unusual flavours. Amaretto is lovely, and the caramel one is darker, almost burnt, and not too sweet. Pomegranate is silky-sweet-tart, and I barely snagged a …

I've had all the truffles here over the past nearly 20 years (if they've been open that long) and they're all great but what a lot of people miss is they have the best hot chocolate! They use the same chocolate that the hand made truffles are dipped in. Go in and try a cup, tell em Brian sent you!
After trying 7 different types of truffles at this hidden shop, we are totally addicted! Can't even look at other chocolates after eating XOX. Pure perfection.

If you like chocolate, walk into XOX Truffles and create a box of your favorite flavors. They homemake truffles and have so many great flavors, so mix and match to your heart's delight. I enjoyed the cognac truffle and the rest that I had!
Made with love
Best truffles in the world!!! The end. Try the milk chocolate, amaretto, orange and earl grey

Using CacaoBarry to make their truffles and then placing them in a very cold fridge, these are interesting truffles. There are accolades all over the shop about the owner and when I was in there one of the staff was talking about how she …
Oh MY GOODNESS. Free truffle with purchase of small coffee?!? Perfect combo. Love this place.
Decent truffles, but flavor variation between truffles is very subtle
Great truffles from this unpretentious shop on Columbus. They make a great gift, but unfortunately they don't really have any nice gift boxes.

Worth every penny!  I live about 2 blocks from this place and always pick up their treats to give as gifts.  They're tiny bursts of flavor that just melt in your mouth - and very definitely made by hand and with love.  I especially …
Very delicious truffles ! Highly recommended.
Get the large container.
